about_the_game:
MistsBook is a roguelike game that combines deck building and autobattler design, created by the independent game team Dehist from China.

You are drinking in a bar when suddenly a beautiful girl sits down opposite you. She gives you a mysterious smile and hands you a book, telling you that if you flip to the last page of this book, she will grant you a request.

Features:

Ultimate deck building
Each time, you will choose at least three sets of decks to start the game. There are matching mechanisms waiting for you to explore between each set of decks, allowing you to build decks that generate as much energy as possible during the game.



Auto Battler?
Just click the button to enjoy the synergy effect between the cards you carefully configure. In each turn, you will have the chance to adjust the order of your cards or keep them in your hand.



Floral Seals
Want to keep a certain card in your hand? Want to enhance the power of a certain card? Want to control the order of certain cards? Floral seals will meet your expectations.



Mysterious Patterns
You will have the opportunity to obtain powerful mists cards, which may be the real core of your deck building.



Unique Symbols
Each symbol will enhance the energy of your deck.



Challenge Bookmark
In each chapter, you may choose a bookmark to exchange for a more needed exploration ability.

short_description: MistsBook is a deck-building roguelike game where automatic chain reactions form the core gameplay. where you can play all the cards you draw with just one button press. You will collect patterns, symbols, and seals to uncover clues and reveal the pages of this book that has no beginning or end.
